articles.author: John Gabriel
articles.title: Shehu Sani lauds Biden for pulling US troops out of Afghanistan - Daily Post Nigeria
articles.description: Former senator, Shehu Sani on Monday applauded the efforts of US President, Joe Biden for pulling American troops out of Afghanistan. Biden had announced in Washington News of a plan to withdraw troops in September, but later reverted to August. "Our military…
articles.content:
Former senator, Shehu Sani on Monday applauded the efforts of US President, Joe Biden for pulling American troops out of Afghanistan.
